title: Engine - Installation

body.body: Make sure the motorcycle is stabilised and adequately supported.
Do not support the motorcycle on any ancillary component, the exhaust system or any other non structural parts of the motorcycle frame.
A correctly supported motorcycle will help prevent it from falling.
An unstable motorcycle may fall resulting in motorcycle damage, serious injury or death.
With the engine on a suitable support, position the engine under the frame.
Raise the engine and connect the following harness connectors at the rear of the engine.
Using a suitable hoist, support the rear frame and outrigger assembly.
With the aid of an assistant, remove
With the aid of an assistant, remove
and pivot the outriggers rearwards. Align the engine mounting points with the corresponding positions on the frame.
Tighten the engine mounting bolts in the following two stages:
Insert the cylinder head front mounting bolt from the right hand side with a washer between the bolt and the frame.
tighten the cylinder head front frame adjuster to
Fit the washer and new lock nut to the cylinder head front mounting bolt. Do not fully tighten at this stage.
tighten the crankcase front frame adjuster to
Insert the crankcase front mounting bolt from the left hand side with a washer between the bolt and the frame.
Fit the washer and new lock nut to the crankcase front mounting bolt. Do not fully tighten at this stage.
Insert the outrigger rear mounting bolt from the left hand side with a washer between the bolt and the frame.
Fit the washer and new lock nut to the outrigger rear mounting bolt. Do not fully tighten at this stage.
Fit the crankcase rear mounting bolts.
Counter hold the lock nut and tighten the cylinder head front mounting bolt to
Position the swinging arm to the frame.
Fit the swinging arm spindle from the left hand side.
Fit the swinging arm bolt from the right hand side. Do not fully tighten at this stage.
Counter hold the swinging arm spindle and tighten the bolt to
Counter hold the lock nut and tighten the outrigger rear mounting bolt to
Counter hold the lock nut and tighten the outrigger front mounting bolt to
Remove the crankcase rear mounting bolts.
tighten the crankcase right hand frame adjuster to
tighten the crankcase left hand rear frame adjuster to
Fit the crankcase right hand rear mounting bolt with a washer between the bolt and the frame. Do not fully tighten at this stage.
Fit the crankcase left hand rear mounting bolt with a washer between the bolt and the frame. Do not fully tighten at this stage.
tighten the cylinder head right hand rear frame adjuster to
Insert the cylinder head rear mounting bolt from the right hand side with a washer between the bolt and the outrigger.
tighten the cylinder head left hand rear frame adjuster to
Fit the washer and new lock nut to the cylinder head rear mounting bolt. Do not fully tighten at this stage.
Counter hold the lock nut and tighten the cylinder head front mounting bolt to
Counter hold the lock nut and tighten the cylinder head rear mounting bolt to
Counter hold the lock nut and tighten the crankcase front mounting bolt to
Tighten the crankcase right hand rear mounting bolt to
Tighten the crankcase left hand rear mounting bolt to
Secure the left hand side panel moulding to the frame, tighten the fixing to
Connect the cooling fan speed controller to the main harness.
Connect the coolant temperature sensor to the main harness.
Position the rear brake line to the motorcycle.
Position the purge valve and bracket assembly to the cylinder head.
Attach the brake line and its grommet to the bracket.
Attach the hose to the purge valve.

body.name: Detach brake line from bracket B00666

body.body: Attach the purge valve bracket to the cylinder head and tighten the fixings to
Incorporating new sealing washers to either side of the union, fit the brake line to the ABS modulator as noted for removal. Tighten the brake line union to
Release the brake line union for the rear brake master cylinder at the ABS hydraulic modulator. Discard the sealing washers.

body.name: Modulator to rear maser cylinder union B00488_1

body.body: Route the secondary air injection hoses as noted for removal, fit the silencer box and tighten the fixings to
Route the alternator and regulator/rectifier harnesses to the regulator/rectifier as noted for removal.
Rout the gear position sensor as noted for removal.
Fit two new O-rings to the gear position sensor. Lubricate the O-rings with a smear of petroleum jelly.
Fit the gear position sensor to the engine. Make sure that the locating pin on the sensor fits into the hole in the end of the gear selector drum.
Fit the gear position sensor fixings and tighten to
Attach the side stand switch to the side stand assembly and tighten the new fixings to
Fit the side stand assembly to the crankcase and tighten the fixings to
Fit the rider right hand control plate to the engine and tighten the fixings to
Attach the rear brake line to the sump and tighten the fixing to

body.name: YL Brake line to sump B00920

body.body: Fit the rear brake line front bracket and tighten its fixings as shown in the illustration.

body.name: Rear brake line front bracket tightening B00177

body.body: Attach the rear brake line to the union block at the front of the sump and tighten to

body.name: Rear brake line front of sump B00746

body.body: Route the brake line and the coolant expansion tank hose as noted for removal. Fit the

body.name: Rear brake line bracket YB1; YK1; YL1 B00142

body.body: Fit a new clutch slave cylinder gasket.
If fitted remove the rubber band or cable tie securing the piston to the slave cylinder.
Fit the clutch slave cylinder as noted for removal and tighten its fixings to
Fit two new sealing and tighten the clutch hose union bolt to
Check the clutch for correct operation and fluid leaks. Rectify as necessary.
Fit the clutch cover finisher and secure with the single fixing as noted for removal. Do not fully tighten the fixing at this stage.
Fit the lower radiator cowl bracket and tighten the clutch cover fixings to
Secure the radiator lower bracket to the lower radiator cowl bracket and tighten the fixing to
Attach the rear brake hose P-clip to the swinging arm with a new fir tree clip.

body.name: Rear brake hose fir tree clip B00862
